targets.rawSql:
WITH
    30 as collector_rate_s

SELECT Time, bucket, count
FROM (
    SELECT
        Time,
        bucket,
        greatest(0, count - lagInFrame(count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY bucket ORDER BY Time)) AS count
    FROM (
        WITH
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time_bucket,
            arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(BucketCounts)) AS idx,
            case when idx = length(BucketCounts) then inf else ExplicitBounds[idx] end as bucket
        SELECT
            time_bucket as Time,
            bucket,
            sum(BucketCounts[idx]) AS count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE
            MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_duration'
            AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
            AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000))
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY Time, bucket
    )
)
WHERE $__timeFilter(Time)

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    4 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
        concat(ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'], ' ', Attributes['method'], ' ', Attributes['path']) as label,
        max(Value) as value
    FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
    WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_pending'
        AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
        AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
        AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
        AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
        AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
        AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
    GROUP BY time, label
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        concat(datacenter, ' ', method, ' ', path) as label,
        if(count_diff > 0 AND sum_diff >= 0, sum_diff / count_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            method,
            path,
            datacenter,
            sum_val,
            count_val,
            sum_val - lagInFrame(sum_val, 1, sum_val) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, datacenter ORDER BY time) as sum_diff,
            count_val - lagInFrame(count_val, 1, count_val) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, datacenter ORDER BY time) as count_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['method'] as method,
                Attributes['path'] as path,
                ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] as datacenter,
                max(Sum) as sum_val,
                max(Count) as count_val
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_duration'
                AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
                AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, method, path, datacenter
        )
    )
    WHERE datacenter <> ''
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
      SELECT
          time,
          label,
          quantileInterpolatedWeighted(0.95)(bound_value, count_value) as value
      FROM (
          SELECT
              $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
              concat(ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'], ' ', Attributes['method'], ' ', Attributes['path']) as label,
              arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(arrayConcat([0], ExplicitBounds, [inf]))) as idx,
              arrayConcat([0], ExplicitBounds, [inf])[idx] as bound_value,
              BucketCounts[idx] as count_value
          FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
          WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_duration'
              AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
              AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
              AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
              AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
              AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
              AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
      )
      GROUP BY time, label
  )

ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
      SELECT
          time,
          label,
          quantileInterpolatedWeighted(0.99)(bound_value, count_value) as value
      FROM (
          SELECT
              $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
              concat(ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'], ' ', Attributes['method'], ' ', Attributes['path']) as label,
              arrayJoin(arrayEnumerate(arrayConcat([0], ExplicitBounds, [inf]))) as idx,
              arrayConcat([0], ExplicitBounds, [inf])[idx] as bound_value,
              BucketCounts[idx] as count_value
          FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
          WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_duration'
              AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
              AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
              AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
              AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
              AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
              AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
      )
      GROUP BY time, label
  )

ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    5 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        concat(datacenter, ' ', method, ' ', path) as label,
        if(value_diff >= 0, value_diff / time_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            method,
            path,
            datacenter,
            value,
            value - lagInFrame(value, 1, value) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, datacenter ORDER BY time) as value_diff,
            toUnixTimestamp(time) - lagInFrame(toUnixTimestamp(time), 1, toUnixTimestamp(time)) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, datacenter ORDER BY time) as time_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['method'] as method,
                Attributes['path'] as path,
                ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] as datacenter,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_total'
                AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
                AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, method, path, datacenter
        )
    )
    WHERE datacenter <> '' AND time_diff > 0
)
ORDER BY label

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        concat(datacenter, ' ', method, ' ', path, ': ', status, ' (', error_code, ')') as label,
        if(value_diff >= 0, value_diff / time_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            method,
            path,
            status,
            error_code,
            datacenter,
            value,
            value - lagInFrame(value, 1, value) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, status, error_code, datacenter ORDER BY time) as value_diff,
            toUnixTimestamp(time) - lagInFrame(toUnixTimestamp(time), 1, toUnixTimestamp(time)) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, status, error_code, datacenter ORDER BY time) as time_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['method'] as method,
                Attributes['path'] as path,
                Attributes['status'] as status,
                Attributes['error_code'] as error_code,
                ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] as datacenter,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_errors'
                AND Attributes['status'] LIKE '4%'
                AND Attributes['error_code'] NOT IN ('API_CANCELLED', 'CAPTCHA_CAPTCHA_REQUIRED')
                AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
                AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, method, path, status, error_code, datacenter
        )
    )
    WHERE datacenter <> '' AND time_diff > 0
)
ORDER BY time

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    10 AS smoothness

SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        concat(datacenter, ' ', method, ' ', path, ': ', error_code, ' (', status, ')') as label,
        if(value_diff >= 0, value_diff / time_diff, 0) as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            time,
            method,
            path,
            status,
            error_code,
            datacenter,
            value,
            value - lagInFrame(value, 1, value) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, status, error_code, datacenter ORDER BY time) as value_diff,
            toUnixTimestamp(time) - lagInFrame(toUnixTimestamp(time), 1, toUnixTimestamp(time)) OVER (PARTITION BY method, path, status, error_code, datacenter ORDER BY time) as time_diff
        FROM (
            SELECT
                $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
                Attributes['method'] as method,
                Attributes['path'] as path,
                Attributes['status'] as status,
                Attributes['error_code'] as error_code,
                ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] as datacenter,
                max(Value) as value
            FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum
            WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_errors'
                AND Attributes['status'] LIKE '5%'
                AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
                AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
                AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
                AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
                AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            GROUP BY time, method, path, status, error_code, datacenter
        )
    )
    WHERE datacenter <> '' AND time_diff > 0
)
ORDER BY time

WITH
    30 AS collector_rate_s,
    4 AS smoothness
SELECT
    time,
    label,
    avg(value) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time ROWS BETWEEN smoothness - 1 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) as value
FROM (
    SELECT
        time,
        label,
        greatest(0, total_count - lagInFrame(total_count, 1, 0) OVER (PARTITION BY label ORDER BY time)) / $__interval_ms * 1000 as value
    FROM (
        SELECT
            $__timeInterval(TimeUnix) as time,
            concat(Attributes['status'], ' ', Attributes['error_code']) as label,
            sum(arraySum(BucketCounts)) as total_count
        FROM otel.otel_metrics_histogram
        WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_duration'
            AND (Attributes['status'] = '200 OK' OR Attributes['status'] LIKE '5%')
            AND Attributes['path'] IN array($path)
            AND Attributes['method'] IN array($method)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project)
            AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter)
            AND TimeUnix >= $__fromTime_ms() - toIntervalMillisecond(greatest(collector_rate_s * 1000, $__interval_s * 1000) * smoothness)
            AND TimeUnix <= $__toTime_ms()
            AND AggregationTemporality = 2
        GROUP BY time, label
    )
)
ORDER BY label

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']
list.label: Project
list.name: project
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.project']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']
list.label: Datacenter
list.name: datacenter
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] FROM otel.otel_metrics_gauge WHERE ServiceName = 'rivet' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.project'] IN array($project) ORDER BY ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter']

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['path'] as path FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) ORDER BY path
list.label: Path
list.name: path
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['path'] as path FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) ORDER BY path

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['method'] as method FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['path'], $path) ORDER BY method
list.label: Method
list.name: method
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT Attributes['method'] as method FROM otel.otel_metrics_sum WHERE MetricName = 'rivet_api_request_total' AND ResourceAttributes['rivet.datacenter'] IN array($datacenter) AND $__conditionalAll(Attributes['path'], $path) ORDER BY method
